title.rendered: GEOGREEN INSTALLATIONS TO PREVENT SOIL EROSION

content.rendered:
Geo Green is an initiative launched by RPPL to promote the Go Green concept and environmental sustainability, as well as to prevent soil erosion on either side of roads. Actually, the road construction process moves a lot of soil and loosens it, affecting the quality of land around the road.

To prevent this, as part of its Go Green initiative, RPPL plants thousands of trees and grows grass on dividers, beautifying the roads.
